来到圣奥古斯汀（Saint Augustine），您会觉得自己似乎进入了一个奇妙的时间隧道。这里是美国最古老的城镇。
在1153年以前，修会以圣奥古斯都（Saint Augustin）的教规为基础，制定了自己的教规。

means.word_mean: 1. (Roman Catholic Church) one of the great fathers of the early Christian church; after a dramatic conversion to Christianity he became Bishop of Hippo Regius in North Africa; St. Augustine emphasized man's need for grace (354-430)
